frame.name: Amounting_to
frame.definition:
<def-root>The absolute <fen>Value</fen> of a quantifiable <fen>Attribute</fen> of an item is determined by adding up the values for the <fen>Attribute</fen> of the individuals or parts that make up the item. The item is not expressed as a separate constituent but it is presupposed by the concept of <fen>Attribute</fen>. Alternatively, the <fen>Numbers</fen> form an implicit set whose sum is the <fen>Value</fen> associated with the set. In some cases what is reported is just the cardinality of the individuals that make up the item so that in effect the <fen>Value</fen> is a count. In other cases the identity of the <fen>Attribute</fen> can only be inferred from the <fen>Value</fen>.
There is no cognizer on the scene in this frame. Instead, the frame focuses on the relationship between the <fen>Attribute</fen> or <fen>Numbers</fen> and the <fen>Value</fen>, which is stable and unchanging regardless of who performs the calculation.
<ex>Defence is provided in West Germany by <fex name="Attribute">armed forces whose number</fex> <t>totals</t> <fex name="Value">close to half a million men and women</fex> </ex> . <ex> <fex name="Attribute">Revenues</fex> <t>totalled</t> <fex name="Value">568.86m pounds</fex> </ex> <ex>The WHO estimated that the cumulative <t>total</t> <fex name="Attribute">of AIDS cases</fex> was <fex name="Value">more than 1,500,000</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Value
FE.definition:
<def-root>The value of an attribute.
<ex>The final <t>tally</t> for 1990 <m>was</m> <fex name="Value">199,000</fex> . </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition:
<def-root>The scalar property of a concrete or abstract entity.
<ex>During the first three years of drug squad work, <fex name="Attribute">arrests</fex> <t>totaled</t> some sixty-four persons. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time_span
FE.definition: <def-root>The span of time when the <fen>Attribute</fen> has the <fen>Value</fen>. <ex>The <t>total</t> <fex name="TS">for last month</fex> far exceeded expectations.</ex> <ex>The <fex name="TS">April</fex> <t>total</t> is 20,000.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the time span during which the total of the <fen>Attribute</fen> is the <fen>Value</fen>, with the added information that it is (somehow) calculated at a regular interval coinciding with the transition between spans of time.</def-root>

FE.name: Numbers
FE.definition:
<def-root>A set of numbers that add up to the <fen>Value</fen>.
<ex>Look, you turn those into numbers, and then <fex name="num">592 and 74</fex> <t>total</t> 666, right?</ex> </def-root>
